# Load libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(data.table)
```

# Load dataset

```{r}
# Load the data using readxl library and remove missing values present in different formats

file = "~/group_18_project/_raw/radiation_dataset.xlsx"

hc_patient_data <- read_xlsx(path = file, na = c("unknown", "Unknown", "N/A", "Unkown", "unkown", "None", "none", "" ), sheet = 1)

patient_info1 <- read_excel(path = file, sheet = 2)

patient_info2 <- read_excel(path = file, sheet = 3)
```

# Save datasets in tsv

```{r}
# Save data in sheet 1
write_tsv(
  x= hc_patient_data, 
  file = '~/group_18_project/data/01_dat_load1.tsv')

# Save data in sheet 2
write_tsv(
  x= patient_info1, 
  file = '~/group_18_project/data/01_dat_load2.tsv')

# Save data in sheet 3
write_tsv(
  x= patient_info1, 
  file = '~/group_18_project/data/01_dat_load3.tsv')

```
